page.description: Displays a dialog box that allows the user to select a file from a web project.
page.syntax: Selected_File as C = UI_GET_WEB_FILE( Title as C [, File_Types as C [, Default_Choice as C [, Default_Ext as C ]]])

argument.name: Selected_File
argument.description: The file that the user selected.

argument.name: Title
argument.description: The title of the dialog box.

argument.name: File_Types
argument.description: Optional. Default = "" (all types). The file types to display.

argument.name: Default_Choice
argument.description: Optional. Default = "". The default file name selection.

argument.name: Default_Ext
argument.description: Optional. Default = "". The default file type.

page.discussion: The UI_GET_WEB_FILE() function displays a dialog box that allows the user to select a file from any web project under the current database.
